document_data.mainbody:
Japhyl Cragsmere, who was nicknamed the Hawk, was a noble inhabiting Waterdeep, City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Japhyl was the patriarch of the Cragsmere noble family of Waterdeep. He lived within Cragsmere Villa on Vondil Street in Waterdeeps North Ward.
